description:
Arc and Ariane make their way into the palace of Marquis Diento. What kind of political fallout will there be from one of the Rhoden nobles possessing enslaved elves?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Secret Revealed, and a Bond Forged
Ein gelüftetes Geheimnis und ein geknüpftes Band
明かされる秘密と紡がれる絆
